title: CHAPTER I INTRODUCES GUY AND HIS FATHER

book.title: In Search of Treasure
book.description: 简介： I wish I could send you to college, Guy, said Mr. Fenwick, as they sat in the library, reading by the soft light of a student lamp.The speaker was the Rev. Mr. Fenwick, the pastor of a church in Bayport, a few miles from New Bedford, Massachusetts....
